body:
As some of you may have already noticed, there is "mk" in my username. Yes yes yes it stands for Mario Kart. But what does the 7 stand for you may ask? Not the 7th installment, but ALL 7 GAMES! (This account was made in 2011, so yeah it doesn't say 8). This is a thread to talk about the 8 mario kart games (and the 2 boring arcade ones if you would like, but i know nothing about them).

What is your guys favorite track if you've played them?

replies.body:
I'm with you on both of those about maybe 3 years ago. All the tracks are easy now thanks to tons and tons of practice/online racing. 

I was so glad to see Grumble Volcano to return in Mario Kart 8.

I want to see Toad's Factory and Dry Dry Ruins return in Mario Kart 9.
